other_tests.findings: Hematoxylin and eosin staining showed increased spaces between collagen fibers and disorganized orientations of these fibers in the lower and middle layer of the dermis. Masson's trichrome staining revealed decreased collagen fibers. Elastica van Gieson staining showed prominent elastic fibers due to the decreased numbers of collagen fibers.
Revealed a non-sense variant c.2296G>T,p.(Glu766*) and a frameshift variant c.2383dup,p.(Glu795Glyfs*3) in AEBP1 (NM_001129.5), which were confirmed by Sanger sequencing.

other_tests.procedure_name: Ultrastructural analysis using transmission electron microscopy
other_tests.findings: Revealed the presence of collagen fibrils with irregular contours (flower-like appearance) and small size under the cross-sectional view.

other_tests.procedure_name: Measurement of procollagen production from cultured skin fibroblasts
other_tests.findings: Amounts of type I and type III procollagen were both reduced compared with an age- and sex-matched control.
